name: What is good release engineering? with Jean-Sébastien Pedron, RabbitMQ & FreeBSD contributor (Ship It! #9)
summary: This week we talk with Jean-Sébastien Pedron, RabbitMQ and FreeBSD contributor, about the importance of good release engineering for core infrastructure. Both Jean-Sébastien and I have been part of the Core RabbitMQ team for many years now. We have built some of the biggest CI/CD pipelines (check the show notes for one...
